ARFeatureContainerView Class Reference

#import <ARFeatureContainerView.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(void) - updateWithSpatialState:usingRelativeAltitude:

Detailed Description

This class contains all features, and applies the required transformations to them so that they are properly projected.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) updateWithSpatialState: (ARSpatialState *)  spatialState
usingRelativeAltitude: (BOOL)  relativeAltitude 

Update the transformation, the positions and orientations of the features, etc. based on the new spatial state.

Parameters:
spatialState the new spatial state.
relativeAltitude YES if relative altitudes is enabled for the dimension.
